entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Periods of rain over southern sections overnight. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming north 20 after midnight except northeast 50 gusting to 70 near mainland valleys and inlets overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
